title: Aurelion Sol Visual bug
body: Just lane against one, the same bug that was in worlds, appeared then, i couldn't see the stars but i was taking damage, can you fix this please

replies.body:
There's quite a lot of visual/sound bugs going on at the moment. Ever since 6.19, not sure why. For example Janna Q charges up and then sound disappears. Or Viktor's gravity field is not displayed on the map (happened in a game Bjergsen was playing Kog'maw into Viktor). And there was the Sona bug, which they fixed.

Not sure what's going on.

The best place to send this is here:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report

Please do read the Guidelines for posting (on the left side below the board links) before you submit anything otherwise it may not get seen.

You should submit a report to riot, here's the link 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

Actually a better place for stuff like this is the Report a Bug board:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report

Support does not have the means to action/investigate this kind of stuff, so better to send it straight to the people who do.
